Articles.Content:
Hi! I\'m a newcomer to the KSP game, started watching KurtJMac\'s videos on YouTube and got instantly hooked on the game. I recently picked it up from the site and am having fun doing EVA\'s while in orbit around Kerbin. I haven\'t made it to Mun yet but I\'m hoping to do that and land on it soon!

The community seems great here and am looking forward to reading your guys\' posts!

Keep launching!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
